name: Nowa Polska
declaringWar: We didn't want to go this far. But we must ensure that we keep our independence.
attacked: You will not trample over us as so many others have done!
defeated: Though we fought with everything we had, Poland is lost. Perhaps this time, forever...
introduction: Welcome to Nowa Polska, wastelander. We are still one of the finest nations on Earth in spite of all that has been thrown at us.
hateHello: What do demons like you expect to find among our ever vigilant people?
tradeRequest: I have sent a delegation to your capital. Treat them kindly.
uniques: [-10]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
[+25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities] <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
[+50]% XP gained from combat <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
